file.name: swagger.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
    title: EpicSevenDB.com API
    description: Documentation for the [EpicSevenDB.com](https://epicsevendb.com) API. If questions arise, please open an [Issue on Github](https://github.com/EpicSevenDB/api/issues). For version 1.x documentation (to be deprecated in March 2020), visit [V1 Documentation](https://epicsevendb-apiserver.herokuapp.com/)
    version: 2.1.0
    license:
        name: CC-BY-NC-SA-4.0
        url: https://github.com/EpicSevenDB/api/blob/master/LICENSE
    termsOfService: https://epicsevendb.com/privacy-policy
    contact:
        name: Support & Issues => If questions arise, please open an Issue on Github
        url: https://github.com/EpicSevenDB/api/issues
servers:
    - url: https://api.epicsevendb.com/
      description: API (production) Server
    - url: http://localhost:8069
      description: Local Server
components:
    examples:
        ArtifactListItem:
            _id: abyssal-crown
            identifier: efm01
            name: Abyssal Crown
            rarity: 5
            role: mage
            assets:
                icon: icon_art5_5
                image: art5_5_fu
                thumbnail: art5_5_l
        HeroListItem:
            _id: apocalypse-ravi
            name: Apocalypse Ravi
            rarity: 5
            attribute: dark
            role: warrior
            zodiac: crab
            devotion:
                type: max_hp_rate
        GeneralError:
            error: 'Invalid request. Please read the API docs. Open an issue on Github if this keeps happening.'
            stack: ''
            meta:
                $ref: '#/components/examples/ResponseMeta'
        ResponseMeta:
            requestDate: 'Tue Dec 24 17:31:07 UTC 2019'
            apiVersion: '2.0.0'
    schemas:
        HeroList:
            allOf:
                - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResponseMeta'
                - type: object
                  properties:
                      results:
                          type: array
                          description: Returns zero or more of the requested endpoint
                          items:
                              $ref: '#/components/schemas/HeroListItem'
        HeroListItem:
            type: object
            properties:
                _id:
                    type: string
                name:
                    type: string
                rarity:
                    type: integer
                attribute:
                    type: string
                role:
                    type: string
                zodiac:
                    type: string
                devotion:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                        type:
                            type: string
            examples:
                - $ref: '#/components/examples/HeroListItem'
        ArtifactList:
            allOf:
                - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResponseMeta'
                - type: object
                  properties:
                      results:
                          type: array
                          description: Returns zero or more of the requested endpoint
                          items:
                              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ArtifactListItem'
        ArtifactListItem:
            type: object
            properties:
                _id:
                    type: string
                identifier:
                    type: string
                name:
                    type: string
                rarity:
                    type: integer
                role:
                    type: string
                assets:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                        icon:
                            type: string
                        image:
                            type: string
                        thumbnail:
                            type: string
            examples:
                - $ref: '#/components/examples/ArtifactListItem'
        ExEquipList:
            allOf:
                - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResponseMeta'
                - type: object
                  properties:
                      results:
                          type: array
                          description: Returns zero or more of the requested endpoint
                          items:
                              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ExEquipListItem'
        ExEquipListItem:
            type: object
            properties:
                _id:
                    type: string
                id:
                    type: string
                name:
                    type: string
                rarity:
                    type: integer
                role:
                    type: string
                icon:
                    type: string
                unit:
                    type: object
                    # properties:
                    #     icon:
                    #         type: string
                    #     image:
                    #         type: string
                    #     thumbnail:
                    #         type: string
            # examples:
            #     - $ref: '#/components/examples/ArtifactListItem'
        ResponseMeta:
            type: object
            properties:
                meta:
                    type: object
                    description: Returns the api version and date of the current request
                    properties:
                        requestDate:
                            type: string
                        apiVersion:
                            type: string
            examples:
                - $ref: '#/components/examples/ResponseMeta'
        GeneralError:
            allOf: # Combines the ResponseMeta and the inline model
                - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResponseMeta'
                - type: object
                  properties:
                      error:
                          type: string
                      stack:
                          type: string
            examples:
                - $ref: '#/components/examples/GeneralError'
paths:
    /status:
        get:
            summary: Is API Alive
            description: Returns 200 if API server is up
            responses:
                200:
                    description: OK
    /hero/{id}:
        get:
            parameters:
            - name: id
              in: path
              description: ID of the requested Hero. Use the `_id` field found on the Hero List. Example => `aramintha`
              required: true
              type: string
              example: 'aramintha'
            # - name: auth
            #   in: header
            #   description: an authorization header
            #   required: true
            #   type: string
            summary: Hero Detail
            description: Returns a list with a single Hero full data.
            responses:
                '418':
                    description: I'm a Teapot (Error)
                    content:
                        'application/json':
                            schema:
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/GeneralError'
    /hero:
        get:
            summary: Heroes List
            description: Returns a list of heroes with simplified data.
            responses:
                '418':
                    description: I'm a Teapot (Error)
                    content:
                        'application/json':
                            schema:
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/GeneralError'
                '200':
                    description: OK (Success)
                    content:
                        'application/json':
                            schema:
                                type: object
                                description: Server Response
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HeroList'
    /artifact/{id}:
        get:
            parameters:
            - name: id
              in: path
              description: ID of the requested Artifact. Use the `_id` field found on the Artifact List. Example => `abyssal-crown`
              required: true
              type: string
              example: 'abyssal-crown'
            # - name: auth
            #   in: header
            #   description: an authorization header
            #   required: true
            #   type: string
            summary: Artifact Detail
            description: Returns a list with a single Artifact full data.
            responses:
                '418':
                    description: I'm a Teapot (Error)
                    content:
                        'application/json':
                            schema:
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/GeneralError'
    /artifact:
        get:
            summary: Artifacts List
            description: Returns a list of artifacts with simplified data.
            responses:
                '418':
                    description: I'm a Teapot (Error)
                    content:
                        'application/json':
                            schema:
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/GeneralError'
                '200':
                    description: OK (Success)
                    content:
                        'application/json':
                            schema:
                                type: object
                                description: Server Response
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ArtifactList'
    /ex_equip/{id}:
        get:
            parameters:
            - name: id
              in: path
              description: ID of the requested Exclusive Equipment. Use the `_id` field found on the Exclusive Equipment List. Example => `exc100301`
              required: true
              type: string
              example: 'exc100301'
            # - name: auth
            #   in: header
            #   description: an authorization header
            #   required: true
            #   type: string
            summary: Exclusive Equipment Detail
            description: Returns a list with a single Exclusive Equipment full data.
            responses:
                '418':
                    description: I'm a Teapot (Error)
                    content:
                        'application/json':
                            schema:
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/GeneralError'
    /ex_equip:
        get:
            summary: Exclusive Equipment List
            description: Returns a list of Exclusive Equipment with simplified data.
            responses:
                '418':
                    description: I'm a Teapot (Error)
                    content:
                        'application/json':
                            schema:
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/GeneralError'
                '200':
                    description: OK (Success)
                    content:
                        'application/json':
                            schema:
                                type: object
                                description: Server Response
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ExEquipList'

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: paths: /artifact/{id}: get: parameters: parse parameter "id": parameter MUST contain either a schema property, or a content property
